title: New Computer, and Now I Don't Have/Know the Font
content:
Like an idiot, I never wrote down the font names for the images used in this site (I didn’t create it, I just maintain it). Now on my new computer, I’m editing and getting the “font not available” message—but I have no idea what either of these fonts is. I do know that the title font (“Sampling”) has an Alien effect on it. Anyone know what either font is, or both?

Thanks,  
Stevie

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173748im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/home2_6036.jpg)

 [‹ OBEY](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173748/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45045 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID: Spurred "3" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173748/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45076 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stevier

comments.content: The bottom one is [Oz Handicraft](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173748/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/oz-handicraft/) and I think the top one is [Compacta](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173748/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/compacta/)
Thanks so much! Now to just install those... :)
